channel.title: Drug lady says:
channel.description: I find it kinda weird for some reason, that all drug teacher's biggest arguement about smoking weed is that it's way stronger. WTF, if one joint 30 years ago was 2-4%, and one now is 20-40% wouldn't that mean that you have to smoke less to get baked? It's less bad for your lungs, jeez' you'd have to smoke 20 of the old joints for one of ours, so then, doing math here saying you smoke 4 per week: Now : 4 joints = bad for lungs Before : 80 joints = no more lungs Sure the thc is bad for the brain but who cares? It's the lungs I really care about. Discuss.

item.title: Drug lady says:
item.dc:creator: @Gravey Gravey
item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

Heh, you read my mind , im currently in the progress of getting a job,
then with my first paycheck ->vaporizer

Read full topic

item.title: Drug lady says:
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Oh and by the way, if you are concerned about your lungs you could do it orally or use a vaporizer. Even a bong will help filter out some nasty chemicals.

Read full topic

item.title: Drug lady says:
item.dc:creator: @Gravey Gravey
item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

jme_009:

Bring your argument to the class, well presented. By the way, I don’t know how you define “bad” but you should remember that your brain produces THC naturally, and really it’s effects are not at all devastating or long-term.

…Hear that gravey, you were complimented…

Today was the last day of drug class so I can’t really say it, but yea, drug lady = not very smart.

Read full topic

item.title: Drug lady says:

item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

I find it kinda weird for some reason, that all drug teacher’s biggest
arguement about smoking weed is that it’s way stronger. WTF, if one
joint 30 years ago was 2-4%, and one now is 20-40% wouldn’t that mean
that you have to smoke less to get baked? It’s less bad for your lungs, jeez’
you’d have to smoke 20 of the old joints for one of ours, so then, doing math here
saying you smoke 4 per week:
Now : 4 joints = bad for lungs
Before : 80 joints = no more lungs
Sure the thc is bad for the brain but who cares? It’s the lungs I really care about.
Discuss.
